title: Pixel 4/XL users
content:
This may not be the correct place to even ask about it, but it's Google planning on doing anything for Pixel 4 buyers when upgrading to the pixel 5? Apart from Pixel 4 pre-orderers losing out on a $200 deal, they discontinued the phone less than 1 year after release... We are missing 5g compatibility, and it seems that we are just getting screwed over constantly.

I think pixel phones are great, but I'm getting the feeling Google doesn't care about loyalty/pre-orderers and it's kind of a shame.
